title: A Loaf of bread
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Malcolm Otton
brief_description: Shows the whole process for the production of bread, beginning with the planting and harvesting of wheat and the milling of flour. After scenes showing the preparation of the dough, animated drawings show how the bread is carried through the oven on an endless belt, coming out baked and ready for delivery.
